UnitOfMeasure.name: UnitOfMeasure
UnitOfMeasure.description: Represents the unit of measures for care metrics and care observations

Description.description: The description of this unit of measure.

ConversionFactor.description: The factor or rate that's used to convert this unit of measurement to the base unit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this unit of measure.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

Type.description: The type of the unit of measure. For example, weight, distance, period.

Sequence.description: The sequence number assigned to the unit of measure.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the unit of measure.

UnitCode.description: The code for this unit of measure. For example, mm[Hg], mcg/mL., kgs, lbs.

UnitOfMeasureClassId.description: The class associated with the unit of measurement.
